_comment: Lambda function configuration for polizalab-client-handler. Mirrors the runtime and patterns used by policy-handler-py (Python 3.12, handler.handler). The deploy-clients.sh script reads this file to create or update the function.
description: Handles all CRUD operations for the Clients feature of PolizaLab CRM. Manages client creation, updates, archiving, duplicate detection, and policy linking.
